description: Visva-Bharati University at a crossroads, facing controversy, cutbacks, and campus unrest amid NEP reforms in Indian higher education.

description: Pakistan's Prime Minister Shahbaz Sharif renewed his country's nomination of Donald Trump for the Nobel Peace Prize, praising his intervention in the India-Pakistan conflict. Trump, visibly pleased, joked about returning home after the praise. The event also saw some diplomatic gaffes and criticism of Trump's focus on self-praise.

description: Facing anti-incumbency, the BJP has replaced several sitting MLAs in Bihar, fielding 71 candidates for the upcoming polls. The party's first list prioritizes a mix of fresh faces and experienced leaders, balancing social justice with strategic political considerations across various caste groups. Prominent figures and new contenders feature in this crucial selection.

He dismissed fitness concerns, stating his presence for Bengal proves his readiness for longer formats. Shami emphasized that selection decisions lie with the selectors, not him, and he awaits updates from the NCA.

description: China has imposed sanctions on US subsidiaries of South Korean shipbuilding giant Hanwha Ocean, escalating the trade war. This move, alongside US port fees on Chinese ships, signals a broader fight over maritime dominance. Both nations are leveraging their shipbuilding capabilities and port access as new fronts in the ongoing economic conflict.

description: West Bengal police have ruled out gang-rape in the Durgapur medical student assault case, stating one of the five arrested accused committed sexual assault. The involvement of others is under investigation, with the victim's friend also being questioned. Evidence collection, including scene reconstruction and forensic analysis, is ongoing.

description: The body needs healthy kidneys to perform waste elimination, and chemical equilibrium maintenance. Dr. Yaranov suggests performing creatinine tests along with glomerular filtration rate (GFR), and electrolyte level assessments to evaluate kidney function. The tests provide information about metabolic health status by revealing potential risks for hypertension, and acid-base disorders

description: A police officer's family refused to hand over his body after his death, taking it to their village. This follows the suicide of a senior officer who accused 16 officials of harassment. The Haryana government has made administrative changes and amended the FIR to include SC/ST Act provisions following a request from the deceased officer's wife.

Google has a new 'Work From Home' rule: Employees can't use…
description: Google has significantly restricted its "Work From Anywhere" policy, limiting employee flexibility. Workers can no longer use WFA days to work from home or different Google offices. The policy, now intended for week-long increments, aims to return to its original intent, impacting employees who valued pandemic-era remote freedom.

title: Low magnesium: The silent cause behind your poor sleep, anxiety and fatigue
description: Millions of people worldwide struggle with low magnesium, often without realizing it. The deficiency can lead to poor sleep, anxiety, and fatigue. It’s one of the most overlooked nutrients today.

title: Did Mahomes boycott Bad Bunny for Charlie Kirk? Truth explained
description: Viral claims that Patrick Mahomes would boycott the 2026 Super Bowl over Bad Bunny's halftime show and join Turning Point USA are false. Mahomes has made no such statements regarding Bad Bunny or the political group. His wife, Brittany, made a general comment about hate after Charlie Kirk's death, but Mahomes himself remains apolitical.

title: Rebecca J fires back at Offset with claim about Stefon Diggs, Cardi B
description: Rapper Offset faced backlash after implying Instagram model Rebecca J pursued him. Rebecca J responded strongly, calling Offset's actions embarrassing and defending Cardi B. She praised Cardi as self-made and referenced NFL player Stefon Diggs in a viral comment. The internet reacted to Rebecca J's defense and sharp retort, highlighting her confidence and willingness to respond.

title: Digital rights debate: SC rejects doctor’s WhatsApp plea; suggests using Zoho’s Arattai
description: India's Supreme Court has ruled that access to private messaging platforms like WhatsApp is not a fundamental right. The court dismissed a doctor's plea to restore her blocked account, emphasizing users must adhere to platform policies. It suggested alternatives like Zoho's Arattai app, which has seen a surge in popularity.

title: Jack Roslovic reportedly lost nearly $10M before signing with Oilers
description: Jack Roslovic rejected a significant three-year offer from the Edmonton Oilers. He sought a more lucrative deal elsewhere but remained unsigned for months. The Oilers later offered a one-year contract. Roslovic now aims to impress this season to secure a better deal next summer. This situation highlights the unpredictable nature of NHL contracts.

title: Amazon, Nvidia and Tesla hit as Trump's China Tariff wipes $770 bn in biggest single day fall
description: Major tech companies experienced their worst single-day losses since April, with Amazon, Nvidia, and Tesla leading a $770 billion market capitalization wipeout. President Trump's threat of 100% tariffs on Chinese goods and export controls on critical software triggered significant drops across the tech and cryptocurrency markets.
